name: Army Cargo Hill Mission
description:
Army Cargo Hill Mission is an exciting and realistic truck driving game, get ready to play an extreme army cargo truck simulation game Best of army oil truck and military truck driving games.
Main features of this game are:

Truck game has difficult levels and amazing scenarios.
Army Truck driver drive in real war situation.
Realistic army truck controls.
Great and attractive environment.
New levels are more difficult.
HD graphics, with Realistic Car Controls.
